channel.title: Updates on Hugo Zzo Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Hugo Zzo Theme

item.title: February 2020
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: [new feature] search result positioning (7c549e0) Better search, prepare for search result positioning (03a1bf2) [New Feature]publication page added (5f7b9aa) single page navigate within same sections (5f7b9aa) button shortcode added (a541461) twitter meta tag added (21738fb) meta_image front matter added (cc53aac) footer text markdownify (48b5281) share button(telegram, whatsapp) added (e30aa48)
item.dc:creator: zzossig

item.title: January 2020
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: notice shortcode markdownify support (01daafb) share button design changed (b58c691) tabs shortcode added (d314aa4) ie11 support (541bbd5), (955de47), (9ee37b8) share button support (45fbc4c), (03e830d) bio component position swiching left, right (edcb680) showcase page added (a9f162d) more sidebar options (6d9ab52) font flickering issue solved with animation (f4f8d59) favicon generator support (c2a45b3) long logo support (a464d23) i18n applied to breadcrumbs (e81cd2d) kimbie theme added (a94fecf) jquery removed, author front matter added (8b9ecbd) navbar current menu highlight (3638675), (1bc2c74) support upcomming talks page (b96c310)
item.dc:creator: zzossig

item.title: December 2019
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: talks page added (7478083) search keyword highlight support (d88ae40) copyright customization support (159e6cb) enableGitInfo added for display post update time (543f5e4) contact page added (af3611d) search engine changed to fuse.js (586dffd) busuanzi support, donation support (d182e8f) custom font support (f227b89) meta keywords added (55920e4) reveal.js basic usage completed (e08ce9b)
item.dc:creator: zzossig

item.title: November 2019
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: image lazyloading support (152145f) comment added to config files (2fe99cc) clipboard icon positioning (564ca10) prism.js support, clipboard support (2c23acd) whoami, related, single page, archive page better ui (68d9875) whoami, related, single page, archive page better ui (68d9875) mobile search added (840d728) tag added to single page (2e0f52a) chart.js, viz, sequence diagram, wavedrom support (6cddb78) gravatar support, sticky sidebar, number pagination added (3ef4205) footer auto current year support (3608eb2) flowchart.js support (3ca6ba3) toc switch added (ee4bd8b) card, classic, compact summary mode support (25319a0) whoami UI update (8f40a67) add support for custom css, js (2d6e0c2)
item.dc:creator: zzossig
